metadata.Title: CVE-2021-35269 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: NTFS-3G versions < 2021.8.22, when a specially crafted NTFS attribute from the MFT is setup in the function ntfs_attr_setup_flag, a heap buffer overflow can occur allowing for code execution and escalation of privileges.

criterions.comment: ntfs-3g package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2017.3.23AR.3-3ubuntu4.1').
